question: How do I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password, go to Settings â†’ Security and click 'Reset Password'. You will receive a reset link at your registered email address. If you don't receive it in 5-10 minutes, check spam or contact support.

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: Our refund policy allows refunds within 30 days of purchase if you're not satisfied. To request a refund, open a support ticket with your order ID and reason. Refunds are processed to the original payment method and may take 5-7 business days.

question: How can I contact support?
answer: You can contact support via email at support@example.com or call +1-800-555-0199 (Mon-Fri, 9am-6pm). For faster response, include your account email and order ID in the message.

question: What subscription plans do you offer?
answer: We offer Basic ($10/month), Pro ($25/month), and Enterprise (contact sales) plans. Visit the Pricing page for features included in each plan, or contact sales for enterprise quotes.
